column4: can you recommend an app that I can use to backup my ubuntu computer? something like ghost
yes... try "man dd" for more info... the power-pack for many data-moving jobs
As a simple example (but please don't try this until you understand it) you could do "dd if=/dev/sdz1 | gzip drive-sdz1-compressed.gz" and compress the entire file-system from sdz1 into a file
